label8: All the capabilities you need in one compact lens
label9: The 5x optical zoom gets you close to the action while the 26mm wide-angle lens lets you capture everything and everyone in your shot
label5: An amazing 14 million pixels in the high-resolution CCD create superior image quality
label6: Create poster-sized prints without losing a single detail
label18: iAuto combines with Shadow Adjustment Technology to capture scenes exactly as you see them even in difficult lighting situations
label13: A simple, one-touch button allows you to record videos with amazing clarity in high-definition, right from your camera
label11: 3.0-inch LCD features an extra-wide viewing angle for easier composing and shooting
label17: Automatically identifies the scene you're shooting -- up to 30 different scene modes including Portrait, Landscape, Night + Portrait, Macro or Sports -- and adjusts the settings for ideal results. (Number of scene modes varies by model.)
label15: With high ISO and faster shutter speeds you can capture sharp, blur-free images even when your subjects are on the move
whitebalancecontrol: Auto, One-touch, Presets (Daylight, Overcast, Tungsten, Fluorescent1, Fluorescent2, Fluorescent3)
shutterspeed: 1/2000 sec. -1/2 sec. (up to 4 sec. in Candle Scene mode)
flashmodes: Auto (for low light and backlit conditions), Red-Eye Reduction, Fill-in, Off
burstrate: Up to 10 fps at 3 MP for up to 200 frames Up to 2.4 fps at 5 MP for up to 200 frames Up to .8 fps at 14 MP for up to 200 frames
panorama: PC Panorama (Up to 10 frames automatically stitchable with ib software)
focusmode: iESP Auto, Spot AF, Face Detection AF, AF Tracking
shootingmodes: iAuto, Program Auto, Scene Modes [Portrait, Landscape, Night Scene, Night + Portrait, Sport, Indoor, Candle, Self Portrait, Sunset, Fire Works, Cuisine, Documents, Beach & Snow, Pet], Magic Filters [Pop Art, Pin Hole, Fish Eye, Drawing, Soft Focus, Punk, Sparkle]
continuousshooting: 10 frames per second / 200 images (3M), 2.4 frames per second / 200 images (5M), 0.8 frames per second / 200 images (14M)
lens: EFL: 4.7-23.5 mm (35 mm equivalent: 26-130 mm) Aperture: f/2.8 (W) - 18 (T)
label22: Choose from Pop Art, Pin Hole, Drawing, Fish Eye, Soft Focus, Punk, Watercolor, Miniature, Sparkle, Reflection, Dramatic and Fragmented. (Effects vary by model and may reduce image size.)
label21: Olympus' Magic Art Filters infuse familiar scenes with new and unexpected moods ranging from the exciting to the serene and from the whimsical to the mysterious
label20: Express your creativity with up to 12 special effects for your photos & HD movies
label26: Face Detection automatically focuses on your subjects' faces and optimizes exposure for sharp, brilliant portrait pictures
label24: AF Tracking automatically tracks unpredictable, fast-moving subjects such as kids and pets, and continuously adjusts the focus and brightness so you can capture these photogenic whirlwinds with ease
